VARIABLES.NAME: text
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The text of the input, or the translation results if the input is from another language

VARIABLES.NAME: spam_prediction
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: SpamPrediction object that represents the spam prediction values

VARIABLES.NAME: sentences
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: Array of sentence splits containing SpamPrediction values, this will be returned if you use sentence_split

VARIABLES.NAME: generalization
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The generalization results if generalization is used
